trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Stockton
There was one other sighting in Stockton on or around January 9th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my girlfriend was outside on our porch smoking a cigarette and looking at the moon. when i noticed a bright light and then black and then two more bright lights in the back flying low at first i thought it was a plane bot it had no sound, and it was to big to not have sound it was so strange even two of my kids asked what it was we saw it flew in straight path not rising like a plane i felt a little afraid and happy at the same time this lasted for about 5 mins i was so at aw i could not take my eyes off of it. I just want to know do we have any big planes that can fly that low for that long and be so silent and have three big bright light facing downward.
Summary: three bright lights moving slow and silent a perfect triangle
